data.comment: The match is underway at Stade Louis II.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 2, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Free kick Bordeaux.
In the minute 3, Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In Fontvieille, Monaco push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Bordeaux at Stade Louis II.
Monaco are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 19, Ruddy Buquet awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Wissam Ben Yedder (Monaco) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 25, Important block from the Bordeaux defence as Sofiane Diop fires in a strike for Monaco.
Penalty! Ruddy Buquet points to the spot, great chance for Monaco...
At Stade Louis II, Pablo Castro has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 28, Wissam Ben Yedder smashes in a penalty at Stade Louis II. The score is now 1-0.
It's now 2-0 in Fontvieille as Gelson Martins scores for Monaco.
Ruben Aguilar with an assist there.
In the minute 31, Goal! Monaco extend their lead to 3-0 thanks to a Kevin Volland header.
That's a fine assist from Wissam Ben Yedder.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Bordeaux.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 39, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Monaco.
Ruben Aguilar (Monaco) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Ruddy Buquet signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Monaco's half.
Hwang Ui-Jo (Bordeaux) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 43, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco push forward at Stade Louis II and Wissam Ben Yedder gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bordeaux defence.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 45, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Monaco.
Monaco's Benoit Badiashile gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Stade Louis II.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's first substitution at Stade Louis II with Mehdi Zerkane replacing Yacine Adli.
In the minute 46, Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a second substitution, with Jimmy Briand replacing Remi Oudin.
The home team have replaced Ruben Aguilar with Djibril Sidibe. This is the first substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
Nicolas De Preville is replacing Hwang Ui-Jo for Bordeaux at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monaco are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 49, Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick Bordeaux.
In Fontvieille, Gelson Martins of Monaco is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 56, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ruddy Buquet awards Monaco a goal kick.
Goal! Kevin Volland extends Monaco's lead to 4-0.
In the minute 58, Gelson Martins instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Bordeaux.
Sofiane Diop (Monaco) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Bordeaux make their fourth substitution with Enock Kwateng replacing Youssouf Sabaly.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 64, Sofiane Diop is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Attention is being given to Bordeaux’s Toma Basic and play has been suspended briefly.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
In the minute 67, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Pietro Pellegri is replacing Kevin Volland for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 69, Monaco's Aurelien Tchouameni attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
Throw-in Monaco.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Monaco's Sofiane Diop looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 72, Bordeaux’s Toma Basic is on his feet again at Stade Louis II.
Guillermo Maripan is replacing Benoit Badiashile for the home team.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Loris Benito (Bordeaux) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Monaco's Sofiane Diop gets in a shot on goal at Stade Louis II. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco attack but Guillermo Maripan's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 79, Axel Disasi (Monaco) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade Louis II.
Axel Disasi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 81, Bordeaux are caught offside.
Axel Disasi for Monaco is back on the field again.
In Fontvieille Bordeaux attack through Hatem Ben Arfa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Ruddy Buquet awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
The home team replace Gelson Martins with Stevan Jovetic.
Niko Kovac is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade Louis II with Cesc Fabregas replacing Sofiane Diop.
Youssouf Fofana (Monaco) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Youssouf Fofana for Monaco gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
In the minute 88, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Monaco needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux just outside Monaco's area.
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Cesc Fabregas (Monaco) gets a yellow card.
